title: water_pump_preparation_peak_solar_window
summary: Preparation to operate water pump during peak solar window to avoid drawing power from batteries.
description: This record documents preparation for water pumping at MaMeeFarm under a solar-powered electricity system. Water pumping is scheduled during the peak direct-current solar window (approximately 11:00â€“14:00) to minimize battery discharge. Battery capacity is conserved for nighttime data logging and system continuity.
